price: 98. Boyeba ete ya sôló, Allah apesaka etumbu ya makasi mpe ya sôló, Allah azali molimbisi atonda mawa.
arabic: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: iʿ'lamū anna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi wa-anna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
